thread.title: BRIEF-Four Springs Capital Trust Announces $40 mln Convertible Preferred Investment From Guggenheim Investments

title: BRIEF-Four Springs Capital Trust Announces $40 mln Convertible Preferred Investment From Guggenheim Investments

organizations.name: convertible preferred investment from guggenheim investments
ln convertible preferred investment from guggenheim investments reuters

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Four Springs Capital Trust:
* FOUR SPRINGS CAPITAL TRUST ANNOUNCES $40 MILLION CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED INVESTMENT FROM GUGGENHEIM INVESTMENTS
* FOUR SPRINGS CAPITAL TRUST - ‍AS PART OF TRANSACTION, CO‘S BOARD OF TRUSTEES WILL BE INCREASED FROM SEVEN TO EIGHT MEMBERS
* FOUR SPRINGS CAPITAL TRUST - ‍AS PART OF TRANSACTION, GREG KRANIAS OF GUGGENHEIM INVESTMENTS WILL JOIN COMPANY‘S BOARD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
